Package vykreslenie

Class Platno

java.lang.Object
vykreslenie.Platno
public class Platno
extends java.lang.Object
Trieda má na starosti vykresľovanie tvarov/ikon pre užívateľa.

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible​(boolean visible)
      Set the canvas visibility and brings canvas to the front of screen when made visible. This method can also be used to bring an already visible canvas to the front of other windows.
      Parameters:
      visible - boolean value representing the desired visibility of the canvas (true or false)

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.lang.Object objekt, java.lang.String farba, java.awt.Shape tvar)
      Draw a given shape onto the canvas.
      Parameters:
      objekt - an object to define identity for this shape
      farba - the color of the shape
      tvar - the shape object to be drawn on the canvas

    • erase

      public void erase​(java.lang.Object objekt)
      Erase a given shape's from the screen.
      Parameters:
      objekt - the shape object to be erased

    • setForegroundColor

      public void setForegroundColor​(java.lang.String farba)
      Set the foreground colour of the Canvas.
      Parameters:
      farba - the new colour for the foreground of the Canvas

    • wait

      public void wait​(int milisekundy)
      Wait for a specified number of milliseconds before finishing. This provides an easy way to specify a small delay which can be used when producing animations.
      Parameters:
      milisekundy - the number
